name: lambdaConnector
description: The lambda connector supports invocation of AWS lambda functions from an APS Activiti 7 process instance, via the lambda service task.

inputs.name: function
inputs.description: The name of the lambda function.

inputs.name: payload
inputs.description: The payload object that will be passed to the function.

outputs.name: lambdaStatus
outputs.description: Status code that indicates whether de function invocation was successful

outputs.name: lambdaLog
outputs.description: Log produced during the lambda function invocation

outputs.name: lambdaError
outputs.description: The lambdaError variable is populated if there were any issues with executing the connector or the lambda function.
